sourcesContent:
<Card
  elevation={3}
  sx={{
    height: '100%',
    backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF',
    borderRadius: 3,
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
  }}
>
  <CardMedia
    component="img"
    image={person.image}
    alt={person.name}
    sx={{
      height: 250,
      width: '100%',
      objectFit: 'cover',
      borderTopLeftRadius: 12,
      borderTopRightRadius: 12,
    }}
  />
  <CardContent sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
    <Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bold" gutterBottom>
      {person.name}
    </Typography>
    <Chip
      label={person.role}
      size="small"
      sx={{ backgroundColor: '#415E72', color: 'white', mb: 1 }}
    />
    <Typography
      variant="body2"
      sx={{
        color: 'text.secondary',
        display: '-webkit-box',
        WebkitLineClamp: 4,
        WebkitBoxOrient: 'vertical',
        overflow: 'hidden',
      }}
    >
      {person.bio}
    </Typography>
  </CardContent>
</Card>
